    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int x, int y, double angle, double scale)
      Draws the pickaxe at the specified position, angle, and scale Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object, x and y are valid coordinates, angle is a valid rotation angle, scale is a positive scaling factor Postcondition: Pickaxe is drawn on the Graphics2D context at the specified position, angle, and scale
      Specified by:
      draw in class Tool
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D context to draw on
      x - the x-coordinate to draw the pickaxe
      y - the y-coordinate to draw the pickaxe
      angle - the rotation angle of the pickaxe
      scale - the scaling factor for the pickaxe

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int x, int y, double angle)
      Draws the pickaxe at the specified position and angle with default scale Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object, x and y are valid coordinates, angle is a valid rotation angle Postcondition: Pickaxe is drawn on the Graphics2D context at the specified position and angle with default scale
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D context to draw on
      x - the x-coordinate to draw the pickaxe
      y - the y-coordinate to draw the pickaxe
      angle - the rotation angle of the pickaxe
